titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, March 20, 1948

mods.tableOfContents: Vocal Solos: In English "My Hero.". Vocal Solos: In English "Bless This House.". Vocal Solos: In English "Oklahoma.". Vocal Solos: In English "One World.". Remarks: Indian Youth - Challenge to aim high in purpose and a life of service.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
